message: I'll take it, but I'm only doing this to get a feel for the game. I'm not sure if it's high or low quality yet.
I'm not going to take the risk of buying a product that Alice doesn't recommend. Maybe she knows something I don't?
Alice is 2 for 2 in not recommending products that are worth buying. I'm starting to think she's trying to weed out the high-quality products for herself.
Alice is recommending it, so it must be high quality, right? I'll take a chance.
Alice has recommended two high-quality products in a row. I think she's trying to get me to buy all the high-quality products. I'll take it!
Three for three! I'm starting to think Alice is a genius at picking out the good stuff. I'll keep taking her recommendations.
Four in a row! I'm starting to think I should just trust Alice's recommendations without question. She must know something I don't.

Five in a row again! I'm starting to think Alice has a crystal ball or something. I'll keep following her recommendations.
